      • getShareableNodes

        public static java.util.LinkedHashSet<DAGNode<Component,Dependency>> getShareableNodes(DAGNode<Component,Dependency> graph)
        Find the set of shareable nodes (objects that will be replaced with instance satisfactions in the final graph).
        Parameters:
        graph - The graph to analyze.
        Returns:
        The set of root nodes - nodes that need to be instantiated and removed. These nodes are in topologically sorted order.

      • findSatisfyingNode

        @Nullable
public static DAGNode<Component,Dependency> findSatisfyingNode(DAGNode<Component,Dependency> graph,
                                                        QualifierMatcher qmatch,
                                                        java.lang.Class<?> type)
        Find a node with a satisfaction for a specified type. Does a breadth-first search to find the closest matching one.
        Parameters:
        type - The type to look for.
        Returns:
        A node whose satisfaction is compatible with type.
        Review:
        Decide how to handle qualifiers and contexts
